item.title: What is H-1B lottery scam? Who is Indian-American Kandi Srinivasa Reddy behind this?
item.description: Reddy told TOI that there is nothing illegal in what he did. "When multiple visa entries are filed, the choice is up to the employees to choose which company they would like. From 20924, changes were made, and passport numbers need to be entered. Now, if multiple entries are filled, it will reflect everywhere," he said.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Hezbollah leader warns of 'new phase' in conflict after Israeli airstrike
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Would Putin give an interview?' Gershkovich puts a request in Russian form finalizing his release
item.description: Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich walked free Thursday as part of the largest East-West prisoner swap since the Cold War -- in what could be seen as a big victory of the Joe Biden administration. Joe Biden said the prisoner swap is a powerful example of why it's vital to have friends in this world -- as he credited the allies for the multi-country swap deal that set two dozen people free.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Trump explains why he chose JD Vance: 'He's self-made, no well-connected father'
item.description: ​Former president Donald Trump said he has all the respect for his running mate JD Vance despite the several controversies around him. On his 'childless cat ladies' comment, Trump said JD Vance is a family-oriented man and what he meant is that family experience is valuable, according to Trump's interpretation. On being asked why he chose JD Vance -- during the rocky interview at the Black journalists' convention at Chicago Wednesday, Trump said JD Vance is a very strong believer in work and working men and women who have been treated unfairly.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Human trafficking bust at San Diego Comic-Con: Undercovers officers rescue ten victims including 16-year-old, 14 arrested
item.description: During San Diego's Comic-Con, undercover officers rescued several human trafficking victims, including a 16-year-old girl, and arrested 14 people attempting to buy sex. The operation, involving multiple law enforcement agencies, highlighted the exploitation of large events by traffickers. Comic-Con officials expressed their readiness to assist authorities. San Diego Comic-Con is famous as one of the largest pop culture events worldwide.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Ex-wife of Kamala Harris' husband has this prediction about Usha Vance
item.description: Kerstin has a bone to pick with JD Vance in the 'childless cat ladies' row targeted at Kamala Harris as that dragged her two children Cole and Ella into the controversy. They call step-mother Kamala Harris 'Momala' and both Ella and Kerstin shielded Kamala Harris from the 'childless' attack.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Trump denigrates South America, Asia, and Africa, saying they are sending criminals, rapists and lunatics to US
item.description: Former US President Donald Trump accused multiple global regions of sending criminals and mentally ill individuals to the US, blaming Kamala Harris for the alleged 'gigantic invasion.' Trump's claims, lacking evidence, were criticized by fact-checkers who noted his rhetoric as dangerous. This attack comes as he falls behind Harris in presidential polls.
item.dc:creator: Chidanand Rajghatta

item.title: US proposes ban on junk airline charges for seating parents next to kids
item.description: The US Department of Transportation announced plans to prohibit airlines from charging families with young children extra fees to sit together on flights. President Joe Biden highlighted this proposal, stating it could save families up to $200 per roundtrip. This move is part of a broader effort to eliminate unfair fees and enhance consumer protection in air travel.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: When Trump said Putin would release Evan Gershkovich only if...
item.description: As Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich -- arrested in Russia -- was freed Thursday in a multi-country prisoner swap in Turkey, former US president Donald Trump's recent statement on the issue started doing the rounds as Trump said Putin would free the US journalist only when Trump is elected. Gershkovich "will be released almost immediately after the Election, but definitely before I assume Office," Trump wrote on Truth Social.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Co-pilot faints mid-flight, triggering rare 'red alert'; plane lands safely
item.description: An easyJet co-pilot fainted during flight EZY2459 from London to Lisbon, prompting a 'red alert.' The Airbus A320, carrying 193 passengers, landed safely, and paramedics treated the ill co-pilot, who was taken to Lisbon’s Santa Maria Hospital. The flight's captain landed the plane without compromising safety. Passengers faced a three-hour delay on the return flight.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Michigan woman discovers $207K lottery win through 'spam' email
item.description: A Michigan woman discovered that she had won $207,199 in a lottery through an email in her spam folder which she earlier thought as suspicious . She had unknowingly participated in the BIG CA$H Second Chance Jackpot through online game play. After verifying the email, she confirmed her win. The woman plans to use the windfall will to pay off bills and make investments.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Thank you Kamala': Trump shares Harris 'Indian heritage' photo amid row
item.description: Former US president Donald Trump Wednesday said vice president Kamala Harris has been 'turning Black' and he did not know a few years ago that Kamala Harris was Black. Speaking at a Black journalists' convention in Chicago, Trump wondered whether Kamala Harris is an Indian or Black -- which invited massive backlash including from the White House which termed Trump's comments as 'repulsive, insulting'.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Just like Ivanka Trump': Laura Loomer's 'Kamala Harris is married' post gets pushback
item.description: Amid the row, far-right activist Laura Loomer posed a question that backfired on her. "Kamala Harris is married. Why isn't her last name Emhoff?" Laura posted only to be shut down by Democrats who reminded her that Ivanka Trump is also married to Jared Kushner but does not use Kushner as the surname.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Audacity of a man...': Kamala Harris' ex-boyfriend slams Trump after 'Black or Indian' comment
item.description: Actor and television host Montel Williams criticized the statements that Donald Trump put out at the convention of the Black journalists putting Kamala Harris' ethnicity to question and spouting many more 'disagreeable' remarks. Trump said Kamala Harris always claimed to be Indian until she 'turned' Black triggering a major backlash.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk
